content: **linked stitch wrist warmers** ======================================= the mila wrist warmers are crocheted with linked stitches and dk weight yarn giving them a smooth flexible fit that s warm but still lightweight the dk yarn keeps them cozy without feeling bulky making them great for everyday wear with a textured stitch design for added style and an open-finger look for easy movement they re perfect for layering plus the pattern is written in multiple sizes so you can make a pair for everyone in the family **video** you can find a full video tutorial to accompany the written pattern here https //youtu be/s9eeg-pmhak 1 **sizes** the pattern is written for 7 sizes to fit hand circumference* toddler 5 5 / 14cm child 6 / 15cm tween 6 5 / 16 5cm adult s 7 / 18cm adult m 7 5 / 19cm adult l 8 / 20 5cm adult xl 9 / 23cm *hand circumference measurement should be taken around the widest part of the hand but excluding the thumb **materials** #3/dk yarn per pair toddler 60 yds / 55m child 80 yds / 73m tween 86 yds / 79m adult s 114 yds / 104m adult m 121 yds / 111m adult l 144 yds / 132m adult xl 161 yds / 147m hook 4 5mm us 7 crochet hook 3 or hook required to meet gauge ---
